Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: chase
Reviews.Content: Excellent productTons of apps availableSmall compact sizeGreat for kids as well as adultsNice user interfaceColor is great

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Thank you so much I love it, it's perfect for traveling, college, and just for fun with all its apps.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: SMILEYIV
Reviews.Content: We got this for my mom for her birthday and she loves it!  When my kids get a bit older we plan on getting one for each of them too...

Reviews.Title: Not ideal
Reviews.Author: jarett richardson
Reviews.Content: Ok but screen keeps freezing snd keyboard stops working. I have had to reset this a lot and am getting frustrated with it. Small and cute, good size for my 7 year old but not recommended if you need it for work purposes. Mouse works when plugged in but keypad stops working at the same time. Typing with a mouse on the keypad that pops up is not my idea of fun.

Reviews.Title: Great and efficient mini-computer to take along to remote places!
Reviews.Author: Rafael E Pena
Reviews.Content: Superb customer service by Wolvol out of Brooklyn, New York! Fast response to any questions or concern I had with this product. I purchased two units; one for me and one for my wife and we use it to travel because they are so small and nice to  pack. No problems; they work any  where there is WiFi connection.  We use wireless hotspot connection by local providers for our internet connection. We love this tiny companion! Thanks Wovol! You really know how to please your customers! Your prodcut is highly recommended and your customer care is the best!

Reviews.Title: I was very much happy
Reviews.Author: katurcia
Reviews.Content: Great & Excellent customer service I fell in love. I recommend this product to everybody If your like me , always on the go and have work to do online well now is a reason you can carry a small extra something with you when your out of town and rather have your own instead of asking people to use their computer to check on your own work ethics when you can have this nice wolvol... great job wolvol, you saved me my job......
